Dialogue.Value: Hello hello!,It’s Eien Square’s crown jewel，,the Budget Chat Board!
Let’s share useful info about,everything from life to,NetBattling!
By the way，I’m LordUsa，,the board admin.,Nice to meet you.
Psyche〜!
Howdy，I’m Towa.,How can this be a crown jewel,if it was just built? (lol)
Now that I’ve posted，I guess,I gotta say something useful.
Um，this Square’s Sub Chip,shop sells Anti-Virus for only,50 Zenny!！
....Too subtle? (lol),I’m looking forward to finding,even more good info〜!
I’m CrabMiso，Miso to friends.,I’ll hook you up with,some good deals.
The Melt status from MeltWax，,etc. cuts your opponent’s,attack power
My friend caught me with one,and took me out.,('､3＿ヽ)＿
It’d work well against enemies,with attacks that you just,can’t dodge.
That’s neat，CrabMiso!,That sort of thing is good too!
If that’s true，then I have,something to say too!
GrvBall makes enemies heavy.,They’ll crack panels when they,move off of them.
And that’s not all!,If you’re heavy and you step,onto a sand panel....
You’ll get stuck in the sand,and won’t be able to move!
This is something most people,probably don’t know about!
Heyo.,They call me Shinono.,Nice to meetcha.
Useful info，hm....?,In that case，I’ll let you in on,a little secret.
There are some extremely,rare invisible paths in the,cyberworld.
There’s one in City Area 2，,so try finding it if you’re,interested!
There are invisible paths?,I think that’s gotta be a bug.
There’s definitely some locked,mystery data in the City Areas.
Maybe you’ve already gotten,some? There’s good stuff,inside.
Speaking of mystery data，,green mystery data respawn,every time you jack in.
....Isn’t that commmon,knowledge? UsaUsa
I came across some good,info，so I might as well post,my notes here too!
There are various statuses,like Melt，Slip，Blind，etc.!
Statuses have elements，,and they don’t affect Navis,of that element!
For example，Earth Navis,are immune to Heavy，the,Earth status.
Hello. I’m Peperon.,Lemme tell you some of,what I know.
There are six elements：,Heat，Aqua，Leaf，Elec，,Poison，and Earth.
Each element is strong,against two others.
Heat beats Leaf and Poison,Aqua beats Heat and Earth,Leaf beats Elec and Earth
Elec beats Aqua and Poison,Poison beats Aqua and Leaf,Earth beats Heat and Elec
They’re tough to learn，but,memorizing them can really,help in battle!
You guys are smart〜!,Well，I might as well say what,I know about elements too!
Towa told us that elemental,Navis are immune to their,element’s status.
Elemental terrain works the,same way. Some even come,with bonuses.
Aqua won’t slip on ice，,and Leaf can heal while,standing on grass.
I just found something out!,The custom screen lets you,escape with L，right?
Whether this works seems to,be related to your max HP,and the enemies’ HP!
You can escape for sure if,the total enemy HP is less,than your max!
If you’re in a hurry and,a virus strikes，it might,be good to pay attention!
It’s always good to know if,you can get out of a pinch.
I have some experience,with failing to escape.
After you fail to get away，,the chance to escape rises,for the next attempt.
On the third attempt escape,is guaranteed. Keep this,in mind if you’re losing.
It’s CrabMiso!
I’ve got a tip about,busting rank.
For the longest time I,thought that your rank goes,down if you get hurt.
Turns out you only lose,rank if you flinch，just,taking damage doesn’t count!
You can still get a good,rank if you get hurt，,in certain situations.
If you’re a busting rank,noob，I’ve got some tips,as well!
Performing a counter in,battle also raises your,busting rank!
When it’s tough to multi-,delete or end quickly，try,your best to counter!
Some chips have hidden,features.
This is what I found:
I saw a guy use a ChrgCan,with full buster charge.
The power decreased but,its area grew，making it,easier to clear viruses.
Speaking of hidden features，,remember GelPack’s shell?
When you fire a Hakkero it,blocks damage from the front.
It’d be pretty cool to,counter while the enemy,attack washes past you.
If by hidden you mean not,mentioned in the description...
Kedama3’s GrounWav leaves,behind sand panels where,it passes.
I want to score a huge,combo by following up with,a well-timed Storm.
Many people don’t know,that poison does more,than just drain health.
When poisoned，Recov and,other health chips will hurt,rather than heal.
Keep that in mind when,you think about using Recov.
Poisoning is also great,against enemies that like to,heal or regenerate.
VnmShot’s a good choice，,a direct hit will poison,for a long time.
Conversely，if you’re the type,that like to heal，watch out,for poison.
On the topic of elemental,effects，here’s something,about Heat.
I discovered that Heat,Navis and viruses can get,rid of napalm effects.
They’ll still get hit for,50 damage，but they can walk,through without flinching.
Not to brag about my chip,collection，but something stuck,out looking at my stash.
Of chips with versions 1，2，,and 3，usually only version,1 has ＊ codes.
I guess this makes them,useful even if lacking in,power or other benefits.
I heard something that might,make V2 chips more useful,than V3s!
They can be used as,components in a,Program Advance!
If you’ve got a set of chips that,look like they might fit，try a V2!
So it looks like V1 and,V2 have hidden talents!
I wonder what special ability,V3 chips have?
The special ability V3,chips have is their high,damage (lol)
By the way，I heard that,there’s a version even higher,than V3 somewhere out there.
But no matter how many,chips I feed into the Chip,Trader，I’ve never seen one!
The hidden versions might,be something you get from,the CrimNois AddOn?
It’s super rare though，so,not many people have it.
A hidden version chip would,come from S-ranking an,enemy that drops a rare chip.
There’s no way I can do that!,Not that it matters since,I don’t have CrimNois....
But a rare chip，huh....?,I guess a Navi chip would,count as rare.
I wonder if I should practice,S-ranking my friend’s Navi,for when I find a CrimNois.
But if normal people can’t,get those versions，how will,we complete our libraries?
Not that I’m even close to,finishing the rest of the,collection....(ಥ_ಥ)
Good news，Peperon!,Those chips don’t count,towards library completion!
They’re like mutations，so,completionists don’t count them,towards 100%.
That’s so weird! But that’s,a load off my mind.
I think I’d still like to get my,hands on a CrimNois，though.
I went to my friend’s homepage,recently.
They had their own Chip Trader,right on their page!!
He said it was an interior,decoration that he picked up.,I’m so jealous!
Some interior items have,practical uses besides just,looking pretty.
It’s a good feeling to recover,all your HP by lying down,in bed.
Not just because I didn’t,want to jack out，nope.
Man，the interiors salesmen,better be paying you well!,(lol)
I’m not short on money，but,the salesman with the Chip,Trader is off in Engelles!
Otherwise，I’d drop a few,Zenny to invest in a Chip Trader,of my own.
Now I’m glad I grabbed a,trader before they left!
What I’m hearing about now,is a trader that takes BugFrags,instead of chips.
There’s versions that take,FrzFrags and ErrFrags，too.
They give out rare chips of,their corresponding attributes，,nice for folder-making.
Wow，nice -- you could even,sell those chips and make,a nice profit!
Who am I kidding....,those machines probably cost,like a million Zenny.
